element.hint: Calls related to an alarm notification of a potential burglary, robbery, or other crime.
element.label: Alarm Call

element.hint: An occurrence involving an animal such as a bite report or injured animal.
element.label: Animal Call

element.hint: Causing or attempting to cause harm through the use of physical force and/or a weapon.
element.label: Assault

element.hint: An occurrence that is a threat to public peace, health, safety and welfare such as loud music, illegal fireworks, trespassing, etc.
element.label: Disturbance

element.hint: Can be cashier's escort, VIP escort, student escort to the dean's office
element.label: Escort

element.hint: Events related to parking violations such as parking in a red zone or blocking a driveway.
element.label: Parking Problem

element.hint: A wide range of events that include responses to shots heard, suspicious person, citizen assist, etc.
element.label: Police Activity

element.hint: Deterring criminal activity by showing police presence and enforcing laws. Examples of this include vehicle stop or patrol check.
element.label: Proactive Policing

element.hint: Crimes against property that include arson, burglary, and vandalism.
element.label: Property Crime

element.hint: Events related to the taking of money or goods in the possession of another by force or intimidation.
element.label: Robbery

element.hint: Crimes in which a person intentionally and fraudulently takes personal property of another without permission or consent.
element.label: Theft

element.hint: Events that involve roads and streets and include drunk driving, reckless driving, and traffic collisions.
element.label: Traffic

element.hint: Events that typically involve more investigation upon arrival. These events can include an open door, bomb threat, prowler seen, etc.
element.label: Unknown
